name: Helicopter Shooting Strike
description:
Helicopter Shooting Strike is a helicopter action game that combines stunning 3D graphics of Gunship helicopter. Being an elite commando you need to counter terrorist helicopter and tanks attacks in order to destroy terrorist soldiers chopper and release the base from the terrorist’s control.

Be careful and don't take this mission lightly, the sky will be full of incoming helicopters shooting on you, you need to shoot all incoming terrorist helicopters and your mission will end by destroying all enemy combat helicopters from army camps.

Helicopter Shooting Strike puts you in the gunner seat of the most powerful gunship battle. Strategically fire your powerful machines guns and devastating missiles to slay hordes of enemies across the world.

Features:
- Move & Rotate helicopter through navigational controls
- Stunning visual graphics with realistic sound effects
- Heli health and radar range sight
- Flight simulation combined in air strike gunship battle
- Good control of the weapons
- Hit shoot button to kill enemy
- Enemies with Gunship helicopters
- Amazing 3D environment
- Different types of Gunship
